title: SOLD: T205 Clark Griffith w/ FULL Wet Sheet Transfer

posts.post_title: SOLD: T205 Clark Griffith w/ FULL Wet Sheet Transfer
posts.post_content:
One of the nicest wet sheet transfers I've seen in quite some time.

The card appears to be trimmed on the bottom border.
